data.title: Is there a JavaScript / jQuery DOM change listener?
data.content: <p>Essentially I want to have a script execute when the contents of a <code>DIV</code> change. Since the scripts are separate (content script in the Chrome extension &amp; webpage script), I need a way simply observe changes in DOM state. I could set up polling but that seems sloppy.</p>
